text: The Swiss People's Party (, SVP; , PPS), also known as the Democratic Union of the Centre (, UDC; , UDC), is a national conservative and right-wing populist political party in Switzerland. It is the largest party in the Federal Assembly, with 53 members of the National Council and 6 members of the Council of States. The current leader of the party is Marco Chiesa. The SVP was founded in 1971 from a merger of the Party of Farmers, Traders and Independents (BGB) and the Democratic Party. == Other websites == * svp.ch Category:1971 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Switzerland Category:Conservative parties Category:Political parties in Switzerland
title: Swiss People's Party
